alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Franklin, east central St. Lawrence and northwestern Essex Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Adirondack Regional Airport, Saranac Lake, Parishville, Carry Falls Reservoir, Lake Ozonia, Madawaska, Harrietstown, Stark, Paul Smiths, Saranac Inn, Lake Colby, Rainbow Lake, Gabriels, Lake Clear, Upper Saint Regis, Onchiota, St. Regis Mountain, Azure Mountain, Upper St. Regis and South Colton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
